about_the_game:
Inheriting the fun of classic dungeon RPGs
Eluminage ORIGINAL", a popular title that inherits the fun of classical dungeon RPG
finally appeared on Steam.

The hack-and-slash gameplay is challenging and
and a high degree of freedom in character creation,
Once you start playing, you won't be able to stop.
It is a highly addictive game.

The Story
Haldorah Eir is a world created by “six wills”.
In a tower called the Dragon's Fang, six rings that hold the power of the gods are enshrined.

The world has long been protected from invisible threats by the wards created by the rings.
However, the rings are broken down by priestesses who plan the descent of the Demon King.

The priestesses attempted to annihilate the rings as well, but one ring continued to exist with inviolable power,
The five remaining rings scatter throughout the world as if to reject the priestesses, and disappear.

The world became unstable, and the power of monsters grew rapidly.

The kings of the various regions, upon receiving the news, mobilized their armies to search for the rings, but with no success.
Finally, a decree was issued to the adventurers to bring the situation under control.

The king's message to the adventurers was clear: “Whoever finds the five rings and rebuilds the ward of the dragon's fangs will be rewarded as much as he desires.

A similar message was sent from the Citadel of Transjerda.

Prayers for wealth, honor, and peace.
Each with his or her own thoughts and feelings in his or her heart,
Today, many adventurers continue to enter the gates of Trangelda. ......

Character Making
In Elminaj, there are 9 races and 16 professions to choose from.
In Elminaj, you create your character by choosing from 9 different races and 16 different professions.

In addition to a “name” and “nickname,” characters can also choose their “gender,” “personality,” and “age.
However, the occupations that characters can take may change depending on their “gender” and “personality,
There are also restrictions such as characters with “good” and “bad” personalities cannot be in the same party.

The “occupation” has an ability value that is required when selecting it.
The initial base ability depends on the “race” chosen,
Each character receives bonus points before choosing a profession,
By allocating these bonus points freely, a character can choose a profession of his or her choice.

Also, since these bonus points are obtained at random,
If you are patient and “re-create” your character, you can suddenly get a higher level job.

Party Formation
In this title, players can form a party with up to six members.
It is up to the player to decide what kind of characters to include,
The three characters on the left side of the screen are the vanguard, and the three characters on the right side are the rear guard.
Note that if a character in the rear guard has a weapon range of “S”, the attack will not reach the enemy.
The characters in the rear guard have a weapon range of “S”, their attacks will not reach the enemy.

■Game Objective
The objective of the adventurers is to find the five rings scattered around the world.
Most of the rings are located in the dungeon,
The rings are randomly placed at the start of the game, so the power of the compass is required.

The compass is illuminated by the offering of a Fame, which is obtained by completing events,
The compass is a tool to point out the location of the rings.
The more femmes the compass has, the more responsive it is to the ring, so be sure to give many femmes to the compass.

In addition to the main event of finding the ring, there are various other events in the game.
It is not necessary to clear all of the events, but by clearing them, you can acquire Fame and GP, and in some cases, new functions will be unlocked,
In some cases, new features will be released.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8
  • Processor: i7 860
  • Memory: 2.8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GE FORCE GTS250以上
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8.1（32/64bit）
  • Processor: i7 860
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GE FORCE GTS250以上
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
